title: By selling a chair of $ 126.90 a man losses 6% . At what price he should sell the chair to make a profit of 4%? - Quora

response.answer_text: By selling a chair of $ 126.90 a man losses 6% . At what price he should sell the chair to make a profit of 4%? Selling price (SP) = 126.90 Profit / Loss = (SP - CP) x 100 / CP = - 6% -6CP = 100 SP - 100 CP 100 SP = 94 CP CP = 100 SP / 94 = 100 X 126.90/94 = 135 For profit = 4% (SP - CP) x 100 /CP = 4% 100 SP - 100 CP = 4 CP SP = 104 CP / 100 = 104 x 135 / 100 = 140.40 The product should be sold at $ 140.40
